title: In a World Full of Ghosts I Became a Witch - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Supernatural
tags: Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Male to Female   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Psychic Powers   Thriller
author: 吃土的书语
description:
Day 1: Recently I think that something is wrong with my eyes as I always see strange things. Wait a minute the cabinet seems to have moved. I’m going to go take a look.

Day 13: I saw them! Damn it! How is it that this world is filled with ghosts everywhere!?

Day 101: There is already nothing to be afraid of! After putting on the witch’s dress,I have already become a ghost!>
